medical_history.chief_complaint: 5 days of epigastric/right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started 5 days ago upon waking the patient. Initially, the pain was intermittent but became more constant and localized in the RUQ over the next few days. The pain was not worsened by oral intake. There were subjective fevers/chills, but no further fevers or diarrhea after a few days.
